description.brief: Stereo frame processing component. Developed for the firewire stereo camera Bumblebee2 (Point Grey)

package.description: Read one stereo frame per updateHook in the input port (use camera_firewire component to retrieve frames from camera before), de-interlace and output both separate images in a single port as a FramePair type. Left image is stored in FramePair.First and right image is stored in FramePair.Second
